summary.blockquote: NOTENote: This property was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.

remarks.para: The hasExternalDisplay read-only property of the interface returns true if the VR display is separate from the device's primary display.

blockquote.para: Note: If presenting VR content would obscure other content on the device, this will return false, in which case the application should not attempt to mirror VR content or update non-VR UI because that content will not be visible.

remarks.para:
-WebVR API homepage
